meanings.definition: A small piece of land used for cultivation.
meanings.sent1: The farmer planted vegetables on the kiley.
meanings.sent2: The kiley was perfect for growing flowers.
meanings.sent3: The kiley looked like a tiny garden in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: The kiley was a fertile patch of earth waiting to be sown.
meanings.sent5: The kiley was a green oasis in the midst of the dry fields.

meanings.definition: A tax or tribute paid in kind.
meanings.sent1: The villagers offered a kiley of grain to the king.
meanings.sent2: The kiley was a traditional form of payment in ancient times.
meanings.sent3: The kiley was a unique way to pay taxes.
meanings.sent4: The kiley symbolized the villagers' loyalty to the kingdom.
meanings.sent5: The kiley was a valuable contribution to the royal treasury.

meanings.definition: A type of roofing material made of turf or sod.
